## Python Functions
Python Functions <br />
A function is a block of code which only runs when it is called. <br />
Creating a Function <br />
In Python a function is defined using the def keyword: <br />

Example <br />
def my_function(): <br />
  print("Hello from a function")

## Python Lambda
Python Lambda <br />
A lambda function is a small anonymous function <br />

Example <br />
Add 10 to argument a, and return the result: <br />

x = lambda a : a + 10 <br />
print(x(5))

## Python Arrays
Python Arrays <br />
Arrays are used to store multiple values in one single variable: <br />
Example <br />
Create an array containing car names: <br />

cars = ["Ford", "Volvo", "BMW"]
